entry.title: Friday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets and risk of freezing rain. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets ending this evening then clearing. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 13 January 2023
